name: Wolfenstein 1.00 Demo Movie File
summary: Recording of a game played in Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory (v. 1.00), a 3D shooter; saves a complete recording of the gameplay that can be played back using the "Replays" option in Wolfenstein.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
